channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024050841
item.description:
Report X-2024050841

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-24T18:14:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-25
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Alaska Airlines
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While screening shipment through xray, found piece that looked like an aerosol can. Performed physical search and found 1 item, heavy duty silicone waterproofer. Removed item from package and shipped remaining pieces.

item.title: Report X-2024051055
item.description:
Report X-2024051055

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-22T15:12:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-08
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 5/8/24 at approximately 1130, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 294822 at the hub facility in Anchorage, reporting a dangerous goods spill. The shipment consists two plastic jerricans, individually overpacked into fiberboard boxes. One of the shipments appeared to have a loose closure, resoulting in spillage from the top. The damaged drum was placed in a salvage drum and the entire shipment is being held, awaiting an amended shipper's declaration for further transport.
